message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. It's a unique item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. It's a great deal, and I think you won't find a better offer anywhere else.

Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your effort, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $100 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better deal, and I'm willing to negotiate. However, I need to make a profit on this sale, so I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $110. It's a fair price considering the product's value, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a high-quality item.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $105 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations and we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $105, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm counteroffering at $108. It's a fair price considering the product's value, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a high-quality item.
